subject: Please validate your contact email address
body:
Congratulations! You made a very smart decision when you joined
this safelist and if you follow these simple steps, in just a 
few minutes you will see why this is definitely the right
place to get responsive advertising and to find good
business opportunities!


STEP 1. Activate Your Account...  

A) Click the link below to validate your contact email address:    
http://themadvlad.com/activate.php?a=1174355186&u=Coopers   
Then open your list email address, which is 
themadvlad@speedy.uwaterloo.ca and validate it too. 
If for some reason you do not get your activation 
emails, go to: http://themadvlad.com/email_problems.html  



STEP 2. Decide If The Special Offer Is Right For You... 

Once your account is activated, a special offer will be made to you. 

This is your chance to grab every tool you will ever need to run 
your own website and make stupid money with it! 

If you decide to take advantage of this offer, you will get 
$12,185 worth of software and ebooks for only $29! 



STEP 3. Login To Your Account & Start Advertising... 

Now, all you have to do is login and then follow
the how to get started guide inside the members area. 

Your Username is: Coopers 
Your Password is: 12345678 
Login Page: http://themadvlad.com/members.php




**********Company Info**********
